suggestion: Specify the action and result, e.g., 'developed algorithm reducing error by 15%'.
Use a stronger verb with metrics, e.g., 'supported team in delivering project ahead of schedule'.
Demonstrate proficiency with examples, e.g., 'used Python to analyse datasets of 10k+ entries'.
Quantify achievements, e.g., 'managed budget of £50k resulting in 10% savings'.
Provide evidence, e.g., 'collaborated on cross-functional team to launch product on time'.
Show with outcomes, e.g., 'completed thesis while interning 20 hours/week'.
Illustrate with actions, e.g., 'contributed to open-source projects in AI'.
